metadata.title: CVE-2013-1428 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the receive_tcppacket function innet_packet.c in tinc before 1.0.21 and 1.1 before 1.1pre7 allows remoteauthenticated peers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possiblyexecute arbitrary code via a large TCP packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tinc - 1.0.23-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinc package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.23-2').
